programme.title: Belle Starr
programme.desc: Belle Starr is the daughter of a Southern aristocrat. When the invading Yankees take over her land, she vows revenge and heads to Missouri where she marries Confederate outlaw Sam Starr, and joins him and his gang in harrying the occupying troops. In fact, the real Belle Starr was a simple outlaw who, with her Cherokee husband, used the opportunity of the confusion of war to line their own pockets.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The body of a well-regarded Navy technician is found floating in a lake, which isnt far from where a popular community event takes place. Sloanes daughter makes an unexpected request.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When Kasie and Jimmy are held hostage in a diner after a jewellery store robbery goes awry, they attempt to keep the other customers safe from the thieves.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tries to verify the identity of Joe Smith, who claims he served on the U.S.S. Arizona during the attack on Pearl Harbor and wants to be buried there upon his death.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Dylan and Julian go under cover in a hospital to catch an "angel of death" who is killing patients who have non-life-threatening ailments. Lizzie asks Andy for his legal expertise when a personal trainer sues her for accidentally injuring him.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Officer Michael Groves ends up in a psych ward after levelling accusations at the 12th Precinct, Internal Affairs asks the team to help investigate.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Investigation into the suspected rape of a woman Benson helped earlier leads to a cybermogul; the team bids farewell to Sgt. Munch.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A promising singer is brutally attacked by her boyfriend, a popular hip hop star. ADA Barba works to build a case, but the victim refuses to aid the prosecution and, despite Detective Bensons best efforts, continues to put herself in danger. The case quickly spirals into a media circus, perpetrated by both the defendant and his uncompromising attorney.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As Brian Cassidy prepares to testify against pimp Bart Ganzel, a woman comes forward claiming that he raped her while he was an undercover detective. The SVU team are concerned that it will ruin the case against Ganzel. Cassidy and his lawyer have to use to unconventional methods in defence of themselves.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager found unconscious in the park leads to a missing persons investigation; Benson must help Noah come to terms with the past when he questions the origins of his birth.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad is on edge as Carisi waits for a verdict in Maddies kidnapping case; Benson tries to help the Flynn family pick up the pieces of their broken life.

programme.title: What We Were Watching
programme.desc: Grace Dent embarks on a televisual trip back in time by setting the remote control for December 1995 and serving up an irreverent look back at the festive viewing options that faced the nation in the past.

programme.title: This Is BBC Four
programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: Follow Adrian Chiles on an intimate walk as he ruminates and reflects on life. A keen walker, Adrian explores Scarborough on the Yorkshire coast. He talks openly about his challenges with mental health his diagnosis of attention deficit disorder and the resetting powers of taking a stroll. Walking alone with a 360-degree camera, Adrian starts his journey at the windswept Scalby Ness. He meets craft-recycling beachcombers before heading to the mighty headland and Scarborough Castle.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: The festive season falls upon the inmates of HMP Slade and finds them planning an escape. Fletch, meanwhile, is certain that the plan will fail and that retribution for it will be extremely unpleasant, so he plans to spend some time in the infirmary. The doctor, however, likes to keep the place empty.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: The Resistance decide that their operations will be inhibited by General Von Klinkerhoffens personal control of the district, and decree that he must be blown up. The Colonel comes to a similar conclusion, deciding on poison, while Herr Flick elects to terminate the Generals appointment with a poisoned dart.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: There isnt a great deal of Christmas spirit in the Meldrew household. Victor at first refuses to be in the local pantomime, or buy presents - then 263 garden gnomes are delivered by mistake. However, things begin to look up when a bottle of wine is delivered.

programme.title: Lucy Worsleys Christmas Carol Odyssey
programme.desc: To be advised.

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: This epic nature documentary follows in the footsteps of the directors 85-year-old father as he hikes during all four seasons through raw and magnificent meditative landscapes in the mighty Oldedalen valley in Nordfjord in western Norway.

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Join Gethin Jones, Helen Skelton, Michelle Ackerley and the team for conversation, advice and tips to make your day that little bit easier.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: Its time to deck the halls because Ben Fogle and Kate Humble are heading back to Longleat Safari Park for a magical week of programmes. It wouldnt be Christmas without mistletoe and a hint of romance, and thats exactly what the keepers are hoping for at the cheetah enclosure. Rachael is the stunning female looking for a mate, and she has two boys to choose from, brothers Mo and Bolt.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Jacqui looks at a two-bed bungalow in Lowestoft, Tommy goes to see a three-bed mid-terraced cottage in the hamlet of Verney Junction, and the team return to Gorleston-on-Sea in Norfolk to catch up with two brothers tackling a Victorian building.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Santa sends his naughty helper Elfred to join Danny Sebastian in presenting this fabulously festive episode of the show. Ho-ho-hoping to unwrap plenty of profits are two teams of Christmas shoppers, and gifting their expert knowledge are Roo Irvine and Caroline Hawley. In red are in-laws Gary and Riah. Sisters Claire and Jill are in blue. With £300 in their pockets, the teams scour the stalls of Newark antiques fair searching for bargains to sell at auction.

programme.desc: The presenters take the prospective buyers around to different houses in the country. The desire for more room, cleaner air and less noise drives city dwellers to seek an escape to the country.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: James Bond Poster, Tiffany Ink Blotter, Titanic Artefacts
programme.desc: New dealer Rambo gets excited about a Bond poster, a shiny Tiffany ink blotter causes a stir, and some intriguing artefacts tempt the dealers.

programme.desc: A celebrity special edition of the general knowledge quiz in which four teams try to come up with the answers that no-one else could think of. programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Christopher Biggins, Rachel Riley, Danny OCarroll, Joel Mawhinney and Emily Campbell race in moving podiums in a festive episode of the quiz to try to win £5,000 for their chosen charity.

programme.title: EastEnders

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Current affairs programme, featuring interviews and investigative reports on all aspects of life in Britain.

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Its Christmas at Button House and Mike and Alison are heading to Mikes parents to celebrate with family. As Mike piles up the Tupperware with what he insists are only side dishes, despite one clearly being an entire turkey, Kitty expresses her disappointment at not spending Christmas day with Alison. Alison promises that theyll be back by the evening and whats more, reveals to the ghosts that there is a Christmas surprise for each of them in the library.

programme.title: Celebrity MasterChef
programme.desc: Today, things take a sweet turn, as pastry skills and spectacular creations come to the fore. Nobody should get too comfy, as one more will be heading home. Finals week kicks off with a trip to one of the countrys most celebrated potteries, Wedgwood, which is celebrating the 250th anniversary of its most famous clay creations - Jasperware. The celebrities will be serving a delectable afternoon tea for some special guests, including renowned potters and the Lord Mayor of Stoke-on-Trent.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: For the last time in this festive series, Ben Fogle and Kate Humble are at Longleat Safari Park to conclude a magical week of programmes. Today, Ben and Kate are set a secret mission to find out which animals should go on the naughty list and who should go on the nice list, but with animals including ferocious tigers, enormous rhinos and naughty monkeys, how can they possibly decide? And what will be in store for the animals on Christmas morning?

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion goes to see a two-bed terrace in Rugby and a two-bed ground floor flat in Doncaster, while Martin is in Tylorstown in south Wales to look at a three-bed mid-terrace with breathtaking views.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: In a special festive show, Charlie Ross discovers the story behind Christmas stamps, which first appeared on cards and letters in the UK in 1966. Charlie meets Chris Taft from the Postal Museum and shows off a unique Bargain Hunt stamp design! At the antiques fair in Malvern, the red and blue teams are ready for some first-class Christmas shopping.

programme.title: Shakespeare and Hathaway: Private Investigators
programme.desc: Frank and Lu are hired to unmask the Voice in the Dark who threatens to destroy Wintermas, while Sebastian is faced with his first solo case.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin takes in the delights of Derbyshire with a couple from Leeds, who, with their fantastic budget, want to see a range of rural properties with all the trimmings. Jonnie takes time out to visit a repair cafe where, over a coffee and slice of cake, environmentally minded customers can take household items to be mended instead of thrown away.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.desc: First through the doors of is farmer Phillip from Cheshire with his son Thomas. Thomas has got an industrial-sized butter churn up for grabs, and dad Phillip has come along to school the dealers in the art of butter making. Next in and local to Edinburgh HQ is Tanya and her entourage of chihuahua dogs. Third to arrive in the room is Niall with a linen tram blind from Glasgows famous Botanic Gardens.

programme.title: Pointless Celebrities

programme.title: Night at the Museum
programme.desc: Dreamer Larry Daley thinks hes destined for something big but his imaginative ideas never pay off and in desperate need of a job, he accepts to be a security guard at the Natural History Museum. During his watch, Larry makes a startling discovery. Thanks to the unleashing of an Egyptian curse, the museums animals spring to life after the building closes. Larry must find a way to save the chaotic situation.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: When his museum friends claim that four of historys greatest villains have come to life, the former night guard returns to save the world!

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: A Canadian immigrant creates a demanding and difficult work environment for her subordinates at the office. programme.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone
programme.desc: Sweden has been a European hotspot for gang-related shootings and bombings for several years. But recently, the violence has shifted beyond low-income, vulnerable, urban areas. Trouble is expanding throughout the country.

programme.title: Amandaland

programme.desc: After embracing minimalism, or as she calls it, simpletonism, Amanda is forced to sell the contents of her lock-up at a car boot sale.

programme.title: Amandaland
programme.desc: Anne takes on the herculean task of teaching teenagers. Meanwhile, Amanda gets a job at Kichens Kitchens and Bathrooms, while Della launches her new restaurant - Double Shin.

programme.title: Amandaland
programme.desc: Amanda goes on a date with South African property developer Johannes, while Georgie and Dariuss relationship starts to get serious, much to Annes delight.

programme.title: Amandaland

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma, living with her three-month-old daughter, sees her formerly estranged mother, Davina, move in. Instead of helping, her mother lives an irritatingly carefree life. Meanwhile, father Malcolm is living back at the bedsit, sleeping on an inflatable bed on the landing. Missing her dad and in a state of despair, Gemma conspires with Malcolm and Derek to hatch a plot to oust Davina.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Longing for her old life, Gemma tries reliving a past night out, only to realise she has changed forever and misses Sadie. programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler gets into trouble with his homemade gift for Monica, Ross tries to teach martial arts to Rachel and Phoebe, and Joey hires a look-alike.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Dates a Student
programme.desc: When a fire damages their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe must choose between living temporarily with Joey or Monica. Meanwhile, Ross gets into trouble at work, and Chandler tries to help Joeys career.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross worries when his student girlfriend Liz goes on holiday with her wild friends. Meanwhile, Rachel is desperate to find a date for a charity ball, and Joeys fridge breaks down.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.
programme.desc: Joey is excited about his audition for a major television action series about a man and his crimefighting robot, but Chandler almost ruins everything.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Meets Elizabeths Dad
programme.desc: Ross fails to impress his girlfriends father who proves tricky to get on with, and Phoebe makes Chandler and Monica paranoid by chronicling their every move in a supposedly fictional book she is writing.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Pauls the Man
programme.desc: Ross accidentally takes Elizabeth to the same cabin where Elizabeths strict father takes Rachel for a romantic vacation, and Monica panics Chandler by planning their wedding.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Since she is the only one who knows that Chandler plans to ask Monica to marry him, Phoebe helps Chandler shop for a wedding ring, while Rachels wish for Paul to reveal his emotions creates a new set of problems.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers romantic marriage proposal is ruined when Monicas former boyfriend returns, Joey accidentally buys a boat, and a dormitory incident reminds Ross how young his girlfriend is.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica is left reeling from Richards declaration that he loves her and wants to marry her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is toasting Chandler and Monicas engagement, but after Chandler fails to come up with the goods in the bedroom, he begins to worry about the consequences. Elsewhere, Monica thinks Rachel is trying to steal her glory when she catches her kissing Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monicas dream of a fairytale wedding fizzles out after she learns what her parents have done with her wedding fund. Meanwhile, Rachel fumes when a teasing Joey stumbles across her juicy late-night reading material.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers desperate effort to bond with Monicas dad by playing racquetball backfires when he accidentally gets too up-close-and-personal. Elsewhere, Rachel tries to teach `landlubber Joey how to sail without falling overboard, while Monica seeks to replicate Phoebes late grandmothers secret recipe by deconstructing her last remaining cookie.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel must hire an assistant and agonises over whether to hire an efficient, experienced woman, or sexy young Tag Jones. Ignoring her friends advice, she hires Tag and soon regrets it. To make matters worse, Tag is attracted to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Engagement Picture
programme.desc: While taking an engagement picture for himself and Monica, Chandler cant stop pulling a strange face, Rachel enlists Joey to take Tag out for a night on the town, and Phoebe and Ross date a couple in the middle of a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Nap Partners
programme.desc: Wedding fever continues when Monica cant decide whether to appoint Rachel or Phoebe as her maid of honour. To help Monica decide, Joey and Ross test them on how they would react in certain wedding situations.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
programme.desc: Monicas first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang goes horribly wrong when they all get locked on the roof after watching a giant runaway balloon from the New York Thanksgiving parade. Elsewhere, Joey wins his first modelling gig as the poster boy for a venereal disease campaign, and Ross competes with his ex-wife to communicate with their unborn baby.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl From Poughkeepsie
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship, Chandlers well-intended attempts to get Rachel a date seem to miss the mark, and Monicas plan to assert some authority at her new restaurant goes awry.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: Radioactive Revenge and a Ruined Christmas
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix have potential a******s aplenty, including a flatmate who uses radioactive material to get her way and a woman obsessed with STI checks.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: For the penultimate leg of their journey Bradley and Barney head to Italy, starting by the picturesque Lake Garda, where Barney surprises his dad by explaining they will be running off the top of Monte Baldo and paragliding over the lake below. Soon after, Bradley takes a dip in the lake when he tries paddleboard yoga. The next day the guys travel to the River Po for a boat trip like no other, as Bradley is treated to a hair-raising ride in a Formula 1 speed boat.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Barney and Bradley Walsh embark on the final leg of their European road trip, as they continue to explore Italy. Having reached Rome, they take a trip back in time to battle it out as gladiators. They continue south and make a stop to soak up the views from a sky high zipwire. As the boys reach their final stop on the Amalfi Coast, they get the chance to swim in the stunning sea, but theyll have to cliff dive in first.

programme.title: Rhod Gilberts Growing Pains
programme.desc: Rhod is joined by Mel B, Jo Brand and Alex Jones, competing for the cringiest teens. Discover whose mum appears to dish the dirt on someones teen antics.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
programme.desc: Monicas first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang goes horribly wrong when they all get locked on the roof after watching a giant runaway balloon from the New York Thanksgiving parade. Elsewhere, Joey wins his first modelling gig as the poster boy for a venereal disease campaign, and Ross competes with his ex-wife to communicate with their unborn baby.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl From Poughkeepsie
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship, Chandlers well-intended attempts to get Rachel a date seem to miss the mark, and Monicas plan to assert some authority at her new restaurant goes awry.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: Radioactive Revenge and a Ruined Christmas
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix have potential a******s aplenty, including a flatmate who uses radioactive material to get her way and a woman obsessed with STI checks.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: For the penultimate leg of their journey Bradley and Barney head to Italy, starting by the picturesque Lake Garda, where Barney surprises his dad by explaining they will be running off the top of Monte Baldo and paragliding over the lake below. Soon after, Bradley takes a dip in the lake when he tries paddleboard yoga. The next day the guys travel to the River Po for a boat trip like no other, as Bradley is treated to a hair-raising ride in a Formula 1 speed boat.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Barney and Bradley Walsh embark on the final leg of their European road trip, as they continue to explore Italy. Having reached Rome, they take a trip back in time to battle it out as gladiators. They continue south and make a stop to soak up the views from a sky high zipwire. As the boys reach their final stop on the Amalfi Coast, they get the chance to swim in the stunning sea, but theyll have to cliff dive in first.

programme.title: Rhod Gilberts Growing Pains
programme.desc: Rhod is joined by Mel B, Jo Brand and Alex Jones, competing for the cringiest teens. Discover whose mum appears to dish the dirt on someones teen antics.

programme.title: Comedy Central Live
programme.desc: Iain Stirling performs live from Camden in the first of nine stand-up specials. With brand new material, Iain talks about growing old and his previous work as a childrens TV presenter.

programme.title: Comedy Central Live
programme.desc: Tonights Comedy Central Live special features an incredible stand-up comedy performance from New Yorker Desiree Burch.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: City on the Edge of Forever
programme.desc: Its up to Mrs Crabtree to save the entire busload of South Park Elementary School kids after a crash puts their lives in danger.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: School is out for summer and with Mr. Hat missing, Mr. Garrison is over the edge and seeks psychiatric help from Dr. Katz.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A film festival moves into South Park, only to have a devastating effect on the sewer system, which causes Mr. Hankey to call upon Kyle for help.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The parents plot to give all their children chickenpox by sending them to Kennys for a sleepover.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen

programme.desc: When Kripke challenges them to a robot duel, Sheldon jumps at the idea. The guys are all excited about building their `killer robot, named Monte, but the duel goes awry and Monte is the causality. Elsewhere, Penny finally tells Wolowitz what she thinks of his crude behaviour toward women and he is devastated, and Leonard convinces her to go and apologise.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon develops a scientific procedure for making friends when he discovers that Kripke has control of a new supercomputer at the university.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Penny runs into financial trouble, Sheldon gladly offers to lend her money. Penny is uncomfortable with getting a loan from him and begins to act out her frustration, which confuses Sheldon. Leonard soon finds out that her financial woes started when she lent money to her ex-boyfriend, Kurt, who has never paid her back. Without Pennys knowledge, Leonard decides to get the guys together to confront Kurt.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A disastrous visit from Leonards mother brings Leonard and Penny closer together.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A game of paintball leads to a squabble when Penny accidentally shoots a paint gun at one of Sheldons cushions, leaving an ugly stain that cant be removed and motivating Sheldon to seek revenge.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Koothrappali take a heartbroken Wolowitz to Las Vegas, leaving Sheldon locked out of his apartment and forced to bunk with Penny.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Things begin to look up for Leonard when Penny makes a surprising revelation on her second date with Stuart, while Wolowitz enlists his friends help when he discovers a critical design flaw in his project for NASA.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.desc: How do they make the amplifier used by rock legends, the famous Marshall amp? Plus, how do they turn wet clay into frost-proof garden pots?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they keep the worlds tallest twin towers clean? How do they make a jigsaw where every piece is unique? And, how do they craft Olympic level hockey sticks?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike and Edd have a powerful and luxurious 1983 Mercedes 500 SEC to restore. Can the boys return this car to its former glory and still eke out a profit?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike and Edd address years of neglect on a Porsche 912E and work to bring home the horses.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Celebrity Fantasy Homes
programme.desc: In Cambridge, Gaby Roslin asks music producer David Gest, former husband of Liza Minnelli, about visiting Michael Jacksons fantasy home.

programme.title: Celebrity Fantasy Homes
programme.desc: `Loose Women"s Sherrie Hewson looks for a holiday home in Sitges, Spain, and chats to Gaby Roslin about her divorce and her biggest mistake.

programme.title: Celebrity Fantasy Homes
programme.desc: Socialite Lady Victoria Hervey chats about life in LA as Gaby Roslin helps her to find the perfect country retreat near Windsor in Berkshire.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Experts Catherine Southon and David Harper go head-to-head for the first time in a decade. Starting off in Kent, these two sparring specialists will head along the south coast of England with £200 as their starting capital.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew haggles with a windmill manager in Kent, visits a hip dealer in Manchester and seeks artefact redemption at a Somerset abbey. He also moves shop after ten years in the same place.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew visits Scotland to see a Victorian theatre in Aberdeen and the remote town of Rothes. Also, sidekick Tee shows him how to do a deal at a steam railway in Devon.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew picks up a Victorian oil lamp and a stunning old American sign in London. Plus, he meets an Oxfordshire aristocrat with a steam train in his private collection.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Catherine Southon and Serhat Ahmet head out on an east-of-England odyssey. They kick off in Kent with £200 and a rather special motor, a Morris Minor Million, built to commemorate the millionth model to roll off the production line.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.sub-title: Weather Vane, Leather Rhino and Mini Jaguar
programme.desc: The team takes on a pocket-sized racing car, a century-old and very rusty weather vane, and a leather rhinoceros. Silversmith Brenton West restores a pair of Chinese fertility symbols, just in time to help celebrate an imminent wedding.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: A 93-year-old D-Day veteran has brought along a treasured item with a proud history: a smart military `swagger stick awarded to him while on army service in Berlin, for consistently being the smartest soldier on parade.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: At Wallyford Recycling Centre in East Lothian, upcycler extraordinaire Sarah Moore is on the lookout for three unloved items she can save and sell on for a profit. To help transform her trio of skip finds, Sarah turns to designer-maker Rupert Blanchard to give a broken games table a new lease of life, while designer Lucy Tiffney has a pair of old lamps to contend with.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: There are shocking revelations for a man who was left as a baby on church steps over 50 years ago, when a long-held family secret is finally uncovered. And a young woman discovered in hospital toilets in the 1980s receives some surprising news that deepens the mystery of her beginnings. Presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: A huge haul of silver leaves Angus speechless and raises a staggering amount at auction. Later, Angus helps Susan clear a huge collection of railwayana.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Raj Bisram and Irita Marriott search for bargains around Suffolk and Norfolk. Its a cautious start for Irita, but she ends up blowing the lot on, amongst other goodies, a supremely unusual 19th-century automaton. She also finds time to discover Lowestofts local hero from the Great War and how a certain Tom Crisp took to the seas in his wooden fishing smack to fight the dark menace of the German U-boat.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Its the second leg of the road trip, with Raj Bisram and Irita Marriott ambling around Northamptonshire. Irita takes it easy with her spending spree, picking up a very unusual BandB sign and an early 20th-century Japanese Satsuma pot.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus struggles to value Victors homemade curios but gets a surprise at auction. He also searches for treasures in an eclectic collection.

programme.title: Angus Ashworth: Yorkshire Heritage Hero
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth is heading to some of Yorkshires big country houses in a bid to help save and protect these northern gems for the future.

programme.title: Johnny Vegas Little Shop of Antiques

programme.sub-title: Bollywood Statue, Blondin Box, Record Player
programme.desc: Kirsten undertakes a major makeover of a six-foot-tall mannequin modelled on a Bollywood starlet; David is eager to repair a Victorian toy, and Mark works on a portable 1950s record player that is showing its age.

programme.desc: Kelly lives in an 18th century cottage on the edge of the Forest of Dean. She believes that an evil paranormal force is causing Kellys daughter to experience mysterious mood swings.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock is trying to take down Carlton Drake, the notorious and brilliant founder of the Life Foundation. While investigating one of Drakes experiments, Eddies body merges with the alien Venom -- leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Victor Sullivan recruits Nathan Drake to help him recover a 500-year-old fortune. What starts out as a heist becomes a globe-trotting, white-knuckle race to reach the prize before the ruthless Santiago Moncada can get his hands on it.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee the Autobot finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. When 17-year-old Charlie revives him, she quickly learns that this is no ordinary yellow Volkswagen.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: Straight Outta Nowhere: Scooby-Doo Meets Courage the Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the Gang find themselves in the middle of Nowhere, Kansas, the backwoods hometown of Courage and his owners, Muriel and Eustace Bagge.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: Straight Outta Nowhere: Scooby-Doo Meets Courage the Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the Gang find themselves in the middle of Nowhere, Kansas, the backwoods hometown of Courage and his owners, Muriel and Eustace Bagge.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Op and Ed accidentally time-travel from the Galapagos Islands in 1835 to present-day Shanghai. They make their way through the city in confusion and make the horrifying discovery that the species to which they belong became extinct shortly after.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest

programme.title: Boonie Bears: Guardian Code
programme.desc: Briar and Bramble lose their mother at a very young age under mysterious circumstances. Many years later, logger Vick takes the bears to visit the Robot Research Institute, and they uncover a clue relating to their mother.

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: In and Out
programme.desc: The entire town is watching with bated breath as one of their own is up for an Oscar. They get more than they bargain for when he outs his high-school English teacher, who then has to prove to everyone, especially his fiancee, that hes straight. The press turn up and one reporter in particular is making life very difficult.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he wont let her go that easily.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Big Daddy

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Coach Ken Carter, a controversial high school basketball coach who received national attention when he benched his undefeated team due to their collective poor academic record in 1999. In the face of much criticism, Carter fought to keep his methods, determined to show the boys that they need to rely on more than sports for their futures.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Parallel coming-of-age stories of a layabout `serial nice guy living a posh, carefree lifestyle off his deceased fathers fortune, and a bright but awkward youth whos tired of his mothers depressed, boyfriend-less state. Their paths collide when the boy fabricates a two-year-old son and joins a group called S.P.A.T. (Single Parents Alone Together).

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywoods move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywoods move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: After moving to China, twelve-year-old Dre Parker falls in love with his classmate Mei Ying. This soon comes to the attention of the class bully, Cheng.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2
programme.desc: Best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous dummy who brings his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the town becomes overrun with monsters, the boys join forces to save Sonnys mom and foil Slappys wicked plan.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two siblings set out on a mission to rescue their ex-spy parents. Summoned back to work from their uneventful lives, the adults run into trouble while on duty. When the children are called upon to help them, they find out about their parents former identities while at the same time developing a greater appreciation for each other.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: The Flintstones

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyones imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Coach Ken Carter, a controversial high school basketball coach who received national attention when he benched his undefeated team due to their collective poor academic record in 1999. In the face of much criticism, Carter fought to keep his methods, determined to show the boys that they need to rely on more than sports for their futures.

programme.title: The Kings Speech
programme.desc: Afflicted with a stammer, Prince Albert, the Duke of York, dreads the speaking engagements that come with being the son of King George V.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Shop clerk Clarence falls for a prostitute, steals a fortune in cocaine and goes on the run, pursued by psychotic mobster Vincenzo.

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five school kids - an athlete, a spoiled rich kid, a brainy nerd, an introverted loner and a rebellious punk - are brought together on a day-long detention where they break the rules, bare their souls and find they have more in common than just attending the same high school.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A lay preachers violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organised crime forever.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Competing teams of storm chasers find themselves in a fight for their lives as multiple systems converge over central Oklahoma.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: May December
programme.desc: Twenty years after their notorious tabloid romance, a married couple buckle under the pressure when a Hollywood actress meets them to do research for a film about their past.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: The Crazies

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari as elephant herds cooperate and meerkats adopt a strange babysitter in the depths of a brutally dry year.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behaviour, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Baby chimp Bart goes it alone, while the fearless members of the bachelor group are frightened by a new toy. programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: As Zoey the golden-cheeked gibbon goes into labour, the other gibbons seem to sense that one of their number is giving birth and so they engage in a morning singing competition. Over in Hananyas group, hot potatoes are on the menu, and a fight amongst the capuchin girls leaves Phoebe with a nasty bite wound that will need surgery.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas

programme.desc: A firm favourite at Brighton and Hove Albion, Yankuba Minteh sits down with PL Stories and opens up on his journey from the streets of The Gambia to the pinnacle of the Premier League. We travel to his hometown to meet his parents and those who first recognised his talent, uncovering the roots of his relentless drive and humility. A story of resilience and rapid ascent, uncovering the challenges hes overcome, and the pride he carries for his home nation.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: A firm favourite at Brighton and Hove Albion, Yankuba Minteh sits down with PL Stories and opens up on his journey from the streets of The Gambia to the pinnacle of the Premier League. We travel to his hometown to meet his parents and those who first recognised his talent, uncovering the roots of his relentless drive and humility. A story of resilience and rapid ascent, uncovering the challenges hes overcome, and the pride he carries for his home nation.

programme.title: The Royle Family

Meanwhile, a mysterious ginger visitor reminds Nana of her favourite musical.

programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: Its Christmas in the nations favourite corner shop, but some of Granvilles most important customers have plans to leave town. Not only is Madge planning to take his beloved Mavis away for a Christmas break but is Mr Newbold also thinking of doing a runner, leaving Granville at the mercy of Mrs Featherstones amorous advances? Granville has to use some of his craftiest wiles to persuade everyone not to travel at Christmas.

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: It is ten years since Geraldine first arrived and the villagers are determined to celebrate it. Of course, things go badly wrong, involving dangerous encounters with Rachel Hunter, a lot of alcohol, Alices interior decoration skills and a life-size chocolate baby Jesus.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: Agnes Browns grandson Bono is being bullied by a boy at school. When Agnes makes matters worse, a mediation session is called. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: Its beginning to look a lot like Christmas at the Royles, and Barbara has gone overboard with the presents, having spent a whole two hours in a pound shop. A new neighbour moves onto the street with an impressive cleavage, but will she be welcome on the sofa? In a flash of seasonal entrepreneurial spirit, Dave reveals the idea he intends to pitch to Dragons Den. Will it take off and make them rich?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: The Lakes with Paul Rose
programme.desc: Explorer Paul Rose digs out his rucksack and heads for Windermere. The National Park attracts 18 million visitors each year, and is now a World Heritage Site. Paul joins the crowds and finds out why the early tourists thought the Lakes was one of the most dangerous spots in the country. He also plunges into the world of long-distance swimming and helps the staff who run the boats on the lake.

programme.title: The Lakes with Paul Rose
programme.desc: Explorer Paul Rose packs his waterproofs and heads for Derwentwater and Borrowdale. Borrowdale is officially the wettest place in England, and he meets those who have battled against flooding and have learned to live with extreme weather events. Along the way, he tells the story of Millican Dalton, the Professor of Adventure, who ran his own expeditions in the Lake District more than 70 years ago. Paul also heads for the summit of Great Gable, one of the Lakes best known peaks.

programme.title: The Lakes with Paul Rose
programme.desc: Paul Rose has as adrenaline overdose on his way to Coniston, beginning with entering a retro cycling event on a penny farthing before joining the mountain bikers of Grizedale Forest. Paul also relives the final moments of Donald Campbell in his attempt to break the world water speed record on Coniston Water, and ends his trek with a spot of rock climbing at Dow Crag before the ascent of one of the areas best known hills: The Old Man of Coniston.

programme.title: The Lakes with Paul Rose
programme.desc: Remote Eskdale is the final destination in explorer Paul Roses trek through the Lake District. This corner of the western Lakes is off the normal tourist track but it boasts Englands highest mountain. Before heading for the tough Lakeland summit of Scafell Pike, Paul meets the folk who run one of the countrys most scenic railways, he has a close encounter with a vulture, and gets to grips with the locals in a spot of Cumberland wrestling.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rare 1968 Honda N600 car emerges from a lock-up in County Durham and Derek travels Scotland to collect an original RAC Bedford van.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of a North Yorkshire-based, family-run historic car auction business, which uncovers some remarkably rare vehicles in Thornton-le-Dale. The Mathwesons attract all kinds of classic car buyers from all over the country.

programme.title: The Great War in Numbers
programme.desc: Hear how an assassination brought conflict to Europe in 1914.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: This location is a first, with the show being recorded inside an active air base at Marham in Norfolk, home to the RAFs longest-serving squadron as it celebrates its centenary year. Objects brought in include a gold cup boasting a handsome history as well as a stunning valuation, a poignant book depicting the hard life of a Victorian orphan.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit Port Sunlight on the Wirral for another busy day of valuations. Treasures under scrutiny include a portrait of Shakespeare discovered beneath another painting, a model of Buckingham Palace made from thousands of matchsticks, and one of the most exciting pieces of jewellery seen on the show.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team take on a modern day fast Ford to see if a quick flip could make a few quid and revisit a 3 year MG restoration project thats still not finished.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 90s Alfa with electrical issues lives up to its stereotype and the team revisit a road roller, four years on. They also tackle a French motoring icon, the Citroen 2CV6 Dolly.

programme.title: The Great War in Numbers
programme.desc: Hear how an assassination brought conflict to Europe in 1914.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team make a second visit to Port Sunlight on the Wirral as visitors dig out more family treasures. Among the items brought before the experts are a stash of rare and valuable advertising signs found on a tip, a religious painting with a tantalising question of fake or fortune, and part of an Apollo spaceship given to a young boy in the 1960s.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Robbies narrowboat gets stuck under a low bridge on the challenging Basingstoke Canal as he battles through water weed. Can he make it to journeys end?

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson explores the legendary Trail of the Eagles Nest, a stunning 100-mile route connecting a group of medieval castles perched across the limestone highlands.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon travels from Darwin in Australias Northern Territory or `Top End, across to the remote Cape York Peninsula, and on to the Great Barrier Reef. Simon sets off from Kakadu, the largest national park in the world, where the wildlife is under threat from the march of millions of poisonous cane toads. He joins a team of toad-busters catching the amphibian invaders.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team take on a modern day fast Ford to see if a quick flip could make a few quid and revisit a 3 year MG restoration project thats still not finished.

programme.desc: A rare 1968 Honda N600 car emerges from a lock-up in County Durham and Derek travels Scotland to collect an original RAC Bedford van.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: A little-known dark past explains the vast monolithic structures that dominate the small British island of Guernsey.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Robbies narrowboat gets stuck under a low bridge on the challenging Basingstoke Canal as he battles through water weed. Can he make it to journeys end?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Steam Railway: All Aboard
programme.desc: To celebrate its 50th anniversary, the railway has hired headlining steam engine Royal Scot, but she has a problem with her boiler, carriages that havent been serviced in five years, and no-one even knows if she will fit the line.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Steam Railway: All Aboard
programme.desc: The marketing manager targets teachers in hope theyll return with students, Chris reveals how some bridges are in desperate need of repair, and Piglet has a race against time to fix an engine which is hoped be on display for the Tour de Yorkshire.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rare and much-loved 1964 Ford Capri Consul coupe comes up for auction. Paul takes a 1957 Leyland Comet truck for a spin, and Dave admits that high on his wish-list is a Citroen 2CV.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek and Paul are off to Leeds on a rare father and son road trip to pick up a VW Cabriolet and a Lotus Elite.

programme.title: The Great War in Numbers
programme.desc: Around 25,000 miles of trenches were cut as the sides dug in and UK factories built 30,000 aircraft a year.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team return to the quadrangle of St Andrews University in Scotland for another busy day, as visitors bring in their family treasures. Objects featured include an exquisitely crafted netsuke bought in a charity shop for a few pence, a collection of toys that inspired the owner to go on to work as a fighter pilot, and some of the earliest and valuable golfing trophies in the world.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts arrive on the North Yorkshire coast at Scarborough for another day sifting through family treasures. Objects brought before the cameras include a moving carved tribute to a Spitfire pilot who was killed in action, and one of the earliest forms of fridge. Plus there is a big surprise in store for the young owner of a Fijian war club, known as a buli buli.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The Restoring Classics team take Dereks advice when he sniffs out the rarest car theyve ever taken on - the last remaining Hillman GT.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team lift the shutters on their biggest restoration to date in the shape of a Series 1 Land Rover.

programme.title: The Great War in Numbers
programme.desc: Around 25,000 miles of trenches were cut as the sides dug in and UK factories built 30,000 aircraft a year.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team take a rare opportunity to set up for a Roadshow inside the Farnborough wind tunnels, the site of important aeronautical research in the 20th century. It is an ideal base for this Remembrance Sunday edition, with objects under discussion ranging from some of the earliest designs for a flying machine to a poignant story of a sailor lost during the Battle of the Bismarck Sea.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Robbie moors by Hampton Court Palace, but disaster strikes when a tree branch smashes a window. His dad joins to help through Hanwell locks.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Gus and Will want an Eastern Bloc car to see whether the old Skoda jokes were deserved. Bidding low they win an orange Estelle - but can they add value?

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek waxes lyrical about a pristine Jaguar XJ8 and a Ford Model T van tests his driving skills.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The Restoring Classics team take Dereks advice when he sniffs out the rarest car theyve ever taken on - the last remaining Hillman GT.

programme.desc: Derek and Paul are off to Leeds on a rare father and son road trip to pick up a VW Cabriolet and a Lotus Elite.
