programme.desc: A seemingly endless concrete line stretching through the French countryside, which sits as a monument to a discarded engineering advancement.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Robbie moors by Hampton Court Palace, but disaster strikes when a tree branch smashes a window. His dad joins to help through Hanwell locks.

programme.title: Fateh
programme.desc: A former gangster must protect a young woman from a gang of thugs.

programme.title: Tum Se Achcha Kaun Hai
programme.desc: Working as a Guide and bus driver in Jaisalmer, Arjun had always dreamed of being a famous singer. Will he be able to make his dream come true?

programme.title: Roadside Romeo
programme.desc: A loveable dog is left on the streets of Mumbai, where he tries to cope with life as a stray. He then meets Laili, and falls instantly in love with her.

programme.title: Tubelight
programme.desc: Set in a small town in the hills of northern India, the story of one mans love for his family and his unshakeable belief in himself.

programme.title: Ta Ra Rum Pum
programme.desc: Rajveer Singh fulfills his dreams of becoming a race car driver, and even marries the woman of his dreams in spite of her familys objections. But when a car accident severely injures him, leaving his family with nothing, he fears that he might lose his wife.

programme.title: Chandni
programme.desc: Rohit and Chandni become engaged in spite of their families refusal, based on their class differences, but when Rohit loses the function of his legs in a road accident, he leaves Chandni rather than placing a burden on her. Years later, Rohit has made a full recovery, and sets out to find Chandni, but when he does, she is engaged to another man.

programme.title: Humko Deewana Kar Gaye
programme.desc: Jia goes on holiday in Canada, and meets the automobile engineer Aditya. They fall in love, but both are already engaged, and part ways until they meet again at a wedding.

programme.title: Kaabil
programme.desc: Rohan is a kind, happy young man. Until one day, a terrible tragedy struck. Driven by the fire of vengeance, nothing will stop him. Not even the fact that he has been blind since birth.

programme.title: Ram Setu
programme.desc: An atheist archaeologist turned believer races against time to prove the true existence of the legendary Ram Setu before evil forces destroy the pillar of Indias heritage.

programme.title: Punjab Ka Singham
programme.desc: After taking charge as the DSP of Singham Khurd, Dilsher Sikhon sets out to end the drug addiction among the youth of Punjab. This sets him against Bhuller, a vicious business tycoon with connections in high places.

programme.title: Dil Dosti Etc
programme.desc: Delhi-based students Sanjay Mishra, and Apurv, challenge each other to win the University elections and sleep with three different girls respectively before the election results are revealed.

programme.title: Lootcase
programme.desc: Nandan Kumar comes across a suitcase and discovers it is full of cash. He knows nothing about who it belongs to, where its from, or how it got there. Nandan has to decide whether or not to take it or leave it.
Led by an ambitious captain, India charges into the 1983 Cricket World Cup final as the dark horse to claim a historic victory against defending champion West Indies.

programme.title: Bachna Ae Haseeno
programme.desc: Raj Sharma has left behind a series of short-term relationships, but one day he meets a taxi driver, Gayatri, whom he falls in love with. However, he worries that his past will catch up with him.

programme.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
programme.desc: A man struggles to win over members of his girlfriends family, who all want her to marry someone else.

programme.title: Dhoom 2
programme.desc: The Mumbai police force are on alert, as an International thief is suspected to plan a robbery there. To help them capture the thief, they hire a female burglar to befriend and then arrest him.

programme.title: Fanaa
programme.desc: A young, blind girl, Zooni, moves to Delhi with her dance troupe, where she undergoes surgery to get her sight back, but her life is also suddenly crowded with terrorists, killing the people close to her.

programme.title: Prem Rog
programme.desc: When Deodhar returns from eight years of studying in the city to the small village that is his home, he rediscovers his love for his childhood friend Manorama, the daughter of the local Thakurs, or landed gentry. However, as the orphan nephew of a priest, Deodhar feels he doesnt have the social standing to declare his love.

programme.title: Mard
programme.desc: Raju Tangewala was raised in an orphanage, and is known only as `Mard, which he has tattooed on his chest, as it means `man. The son of Raja Azad Singh, his blood runs true, and he rebels against British property developers.
